sections.title: Gather Your Documents
sections.content:
You need:
• W-2 form from your employer
• Social Security Number
• 1099 forms if you did gig work

sections.title: Choose Free Filing
sections.content:
Use IRS Free File if you made less than $79,000.
Go to: irs.gov/freefile

sections.title: Pay In Full Every Month
sections.content: Only charge what you can pay off completely when the bill comes. This builds credit without paying interest.

sections.title: Never Miss a Payment
sections.content: Set up autopay for at least the minimum. Late payments hurt your credit score for 7 years.
